name: Lone Lantern
description:
You find yourself inside a strange dungeon with no memories and a lantern in hand.  Fueled by fear of darkness, you push yourself to find an exit no matter how. Disappearing bridge, locked gates, floating elevator. 

Puzzle concept using light to open (or close) your path to escape from the room.

Game Control:

W A S DMove Forward, Backward, Strafe MouseAimLMBShoot Light

Credits:
